events.description: Join us in Altspace for the July meet-up. We will be talking about the latest news in AR and VR, what everyone has been working on/playing, and exploring the AltSpace environment.

Join us in Altspace for the August meet-up. We will have a gudied conversation about Creating Augmented and Virtual Realities. In preperation, it is suggested to read the book Created Augmented and Virtual Realities, however it is not necessary.
